name: Jue Zhan Tian Huang
overview: Jue Zhan Tian Huang (決戰天皇, literally as "The war against the Emperor") is a beat 'em up game made by a unknown company (presumably from China) made for Arcade machines in 2000. The game is known to feature four characters from The King of Fighters series as playable characters: Kyo, Iori, Chizuru, Chin, and featuring Street Fighter II: The World Warrior characters as enemies.
